name: WORKSHOPS
description: We have connected with exciting community groups who are bringing us some fun and challenging workshops. Theyâ€™ll be exploring topics from from robotics to text-based gaming to data visualisation through sound, all with the help of kits donated from our supporters.

name: MAKING STATIONS
description: Everyone is welcome to stop by and build a project at one of our making stations which start at age 4 and go all the way to 18. Parents and guardians are welcome to join in on the fun. Each station has a different level of difficulty, varied challenges and mind twisting kits to get stuck into.

name: TECH FAIR
description: Our tech fair opens at 10:30am on Saturday and will showcase inventions from young people all over the UK. Submissions are still open and can be submitted here.

name: INSTALLATIONS
description: We have three exciting installations in the youth programme suitable for all ages.

name: JOIN A CONSTELLATION
description: A chance to connect... On the day, a coloured wristband will be available for all the young people in the youth programme to find the constellation that fits to them best.
